donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr:
To achieve the expected response, the project was divided into three objectives which were considered essential to expand and organise the fight against HIV/AIDS in the country. These three objectives are:

1.	Increase knowledge and the practice of safe behavior for the prevention of HIV/AIDS with emphasis on the most vulnerable population
2.	Improve the quality of life and reduce mortality of people living with HIV	
3.	Develop the institutional capacities of the National HIV/AIDS program to implement an effective coordinated HIV program

project_descr: Apoyo a la implementacion del proyecto del Fondo Mondial en EG
